PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_UtilityConsumption
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Consumption of utility resources, typically applied to the IfcBuilding instance, used to identify how much was consumed on I.e., a monthly basis.

PropertyDef.Name: Heat
PropertyDef.Definition: The amount of heat energy consumed during the period specified in the time series.

PropertyDef.Name: Electricity
PropertyDef.Definition: The amount of electricity consumed during the period specified in the time series.

PropertyDef.Name: Water
PropertyDef.Definition: The amount of water consumed during the period specified in the time series.

PropertyDef.Name: Fuel
PropertyDef.Definition: The amount of fuel consumed during the period specified in the time series.

PropertyDef.Name: Steam
PropertyDef.Definition: The amount of steam consumed during the period specified in the time series.
